work_experience.description: FullStack Developer working with stack fully based on JavaScript (NodeJS, Express, Sequelize and MySQL at backend; VueJS, ElementUI and Bootstrap at frontend) in iRancho, an beef cattle management application.

work_experience.description: Working in FIBRE project (https://www.fibre.org.br/) with following technologies: Python, Django, RabbitMQ, RobotFramework and Bootstrap. Responsible for the initial development of FIBREChecker, a healthy checker for all FIBRE environment.

Development of a web application that works like a restaurant online menu where users could order their food and the restaurant received those orders, along with the delivery address and payment method. Developed with Laravel at backend and VueJS with Bulma at frontend.

Development of a mobile application that calculates the amount of soybean seeds needed to sow a certain area. The application also shows a catalog of the types of seeds offered by the customer. Developed with Ionic Framework version 1.7.16.

work_experience.description: Developer of an ERP application for small and medium enterprises. Working with a Microsoft stack at backend: ASP.Net MVC Framework, Visual Studio, Azure and Team Foundation Service and at frontend was used ExtJS Framework.
